FuncDef: The display nqa support-server-type command displays server types supported by NQA.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Both the server and the client have been configured before a TCP, UDP, UDP jitter, and ICMP jitter test instance is started. Otherwise, a test instance cannot be started.
The display nqa support-server-type command displays server types supported by NQA. Currently, the following server types are supported:
TCP server, supporting TCP test instancesUDP server, supporting UDP and UDP jitter test instancesICMP server, supporting ICMP jitter test instances that enable the interface board to send packets
